column4: I have a small Ubuntu issue I can't seem to resolve. I don't get GDM loading after the system boots. I have to run startx. If I try to configure GDM, I'm told there is no such user. If I add gdm as I user I am required to give a home directory. Any advise?
ok, nice to know. GDM is installed though. What in the init or X start up scripts should I modify to make GDM come up at boot?
it's a service in RedHat as well...
